title: TCS, Infosys, HCL Tech added two lakh employees in FY22 - Moneycontrol
content: TCS, Infosys, HCL Tech added two lakh employees in FY22  Moneycontrol
description: This comes on the back of rising attrition even as demand continues to be robust. According to experts and executives, attrition is likely to increase before moderating in the second half of FY23.
